resources.string:
Blekinge student union Android application


The purpose of the Android app is to provide an information channel to the operation of Blekinge student union. This in hope of raising awareness about the organisation foremost among students, but is freely available for anyone to use.


What you can do:
 * View news (as well as the full stories behind them) and events from a number of sections that are part of Blekinge student union.
 * Un/Subscribe different feeds.
 * Un/Subscribe different schedules of courses you attend to (or others if you're just curious).
 * Get in touch with the presiding body of the student union. (There are even tappable phone numbers, e-mail addresses and URL:s!)


Notice: This application fetches feeds and articles from several places around the internet. We recommend that you use as fast a connection as possible to the internet to minimize the download times.


Want to get involved in this project? Head over to http://sis.bthstudent.se/skunkworks/android_bsk/
You have to add a schedule first!
End date can not be before start date!
No data to display. In order to add a schedule, tap the menu-button and then select \'Edit schedules\' and follow the instructions on that view. Also, read the help!
Unfortunately we can\'t determine if the person is in his office at the moment, however our code monkeys are trying to figure out a future solution to this.
Something went horribly wrong when trying to load ANY image for what you requested. Be sure to notify the app-author of this problem. (Or try again later.)
Course code (ie. FY1404) or\nschedule id (8 numbers)
The ID field must not be empty!
The Name-field must not be empty!
The ID field must only contain numbers! (Did you forget to press the Search-button?)

In order to use the schedule section of this app, you can choose between two methods. The first one assumes you know the course code of the schedule you would like to add. The other method assumes you don't know the course code or the id for the schedule and have to make a search for these values on http://schema.bth.se.

Method one (known course code):
1: In the field "Schedule id", type the course code for the course you would like to add, then tap the button "Search for course".
2: Wait until the text in the field where you wrote the course code changes to an 8-digit number (this can take longer or shorter time depending on what type of connection to the Internet is available through your device).
3: Type a descriptive name for the schedule in the Name-field and set a time interval that you would like to monitor.
4: Tap the button "Save".

Method two (unknown course code):
In order to be able to use this alternative you need to acquire the ID of the schedule, taken from http://schema.bth.se.
You need to know the course code or the course name that you would like to subscribe to, in order to find it on the schedule-page.

Do the following:
1: Browse to http://schema.bth.se
2: Search for and look at the schedule for course you would like to subscribe to.
3: In the address field in the browser, look for wv_obj1=[8 numbers]. This is the ID you need to enter in the ID-field of the app. Only numbers are allowed and they shall be eight to the number. You can enter whatever you want in the "Name"-field; we recommend that it describes the schedule in one way or another.
Add a schedule by pressing the menu button and select \'Add schedule\'.
